Articles.Content:
I updated to 1.0.2 and did some testing with aerodynamics after my rocket flipped.

 I downgraded to 1.0 and now my save is broken [http://i.imgur.com/9QZarwG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9QZarwG.jpg)

I assumed it was because of the new fins in 1.0.2 so I deleted the .craft file of that rocket, but I still can't use it in 1.0

is there a way to fix it?

had to restart pc to upload persistent.. if that even helps at all [https://www./?22294qdvea90p5p](https://www./?22294qdvea90p5p)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T13:53:26Z" title="05/03/2015 01:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by CanadianDutchman**
Sorry CanadianDutchman but saves are not backward compatible.
well.. crap.. even if nothing really changed? that sucks..
